content:
PROPPATCH Method - Implementation (Cont’d)

  • Request-URI

    • The Request-URI is the resource on which the properties are defined.
    • The current version of the specification requires that the “;DAV/” param be appended to all PROPPATCH requests, I am proposing that this restriction be removed. I further propose, that if PROPPATCH is executed on a property URL then the scope of the PROPPATCH is limited to that property.
